author: passthenachos
title: Flat Rules Based Abstracted P2P Net
description: On-Chain DApp processing consumes network bandwidth and often reprocesses redundant files. Users of DApps utilize chain resources equally
solution: Multi-layered flat-file P2P experience hydration reduces network traffic and has smaller processing needs with control over file sharing
experience: The founding team holds over 20 US patents, 2 Technical Emmys, 1 Oscar, Multiple exits, existing web 2.0 Series B funded with A list clients
